conbody.p:
(S-90) All Acquisition Plan templates, procedures, and supporting documentation templates are located in DARS PGI
7.104(S-90). The templates are consistent with FAR 7.103 and DFARS 207.103 guidelines.

(S-91) The PMO shall provide a draft statement of objectives/performance work statement/statement of work, an IGCE or cost estimate, and the Market Research Report with a combined AS/AP or standard AP. The DISA IGCE Handbook can be found at https://www.ditco.disa.mil/hq/deskbooks/DISA%20IGCE%20Deskbook.doc. The Market Research Report template can be found at DARS PGI
10.002(S-92).
(S-92) AP revisions. Follow guidance at DARS PGI 7.104(S-93) for pre-award or post-award AP revisions (limited to substantive changes).
(1) The PMO shall maintain a copy with signatures of the combined AS/AP, standard AP, or streamlined AP, and any subsequent revisions.
(2) The contracting officer shall ensure the original approved combined AS/AP, standard AP, or streamlined AP, and any subsequent revisions, are incorporated in the official contract file.
